title: A declaration of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, concerning diverse well affected persons and citizens of the City of London who are willing and ready to undertake and advance a considerable number of souldiers, and them to arme, maintaine, and pay for severall months ensuing, or during these times of danger, upon the publike faith. Die lun√¶. 14. Novemb. 1642
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
notes: Place and date of publication from Wing.
Declaration signed: John Brown, Cler. Parliament.
Signed at bottom of text: Isacke Pennington, Major. John Langham, Thomas Andrews, Shreiffes [sic].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
